mapper.sql: TRANS_SEQ_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, BATCH_NO, BANK_ORDER_NO, BANK_ORDER_SEQ_ID, BANK_BATCH_NO, MER_ID, TRANS_AMOUNT, TRANS_STATUS, TRANS_DATE, CURRENCY_CODE, OUT_BANK_ACC_TYPE, OUT_ACC_NO, IN_ACC_NO, IN_ACC_NAME, IN_ACC_BANK_NAME, IN_ACC_BANK_NODE, IN_ACC_PROVINCE_CODE, IN_ACC_CITY_NAME, BANK_FEE, BANK_SUBMIT_DATE, BANK_ACCOUNT_DATE, NOTIFY_MOBILE, UNION_FLAG, SYS_FLAG, ADDR_FLAG, TRANS_DESC, FAIL_REASON, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE,SRC_SUBSYS_ID
ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, TRANS_AMOUNT, TRANS_STATUS, CURRENCY_CODE, BANK_FEE, BANK_SUBMIT_DATE, FAIL_REASON,SRC_SUBSYS_ID
mapper.select: select TRANS_STATUS from T_GP_TRANS_ORDER where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (TRANS_STATUS=1000 or TRANS_STATUS=1002) order by TRANS_STATUS,TRANS_DATE LIMIT 1

select
from (select T.*, case TRANS_STATUS when '1000' then 100 when '1002' then 120 when '1001' then 140 when '1003' then 150 when '-1' then 160 when '-2' then 180 end as orderstatus from T_GP_TRANS_ORDER T where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by orderstatus,TRANS_DATE DESC LIMIT 1) alias
mapper.insert: insert into T_GP_TRANS_ORDER (TRANS_SEQ_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, BATCH_NO, BANK_ORDER_NO, BANK_ORDER_SEQ_ID, BANK_BATCH_NO, MER_ID, TRANS_AMOUNT, TRANS_STATUS, TRANS_DATE, CURRENCY_CODE, OUT_BANK_ACC_TYPE, OUT_ACC_NO, IN_ACC_NO, IN_ACC_NAME, IN_ACC_BANK_NAME, IN_ACC_BANK_NODE, IN_ACC_PROVINCE_CODE, IN_ACC_CITY_NAME, BANK_FEE, BANK_SUBMIT_DATE, BANK_ACCOUNT_DATE, NOTIFY_MOBILE, UNION_FLAG, SYS_FLAG, ADDR_FLAG, TRANS_DESC, FAIL_REASON, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, SRC_SUBSYS_ID, ORDER_DATE_S, TRANS_DATE_S) values (#{transSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankOrderSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currencyCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{outBankAccType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccBankNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inAccCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankSubmitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankAccountDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{notifyMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addrFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{srcSubsysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDateS,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transDateS,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update:
update T_GP_TRANS_ORDER
BANK_ORDER_SEQ_ID =#{bankOrderSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_STATUS =#{transStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BANK_FEE =#{bankFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BANK_SUBMIT_DATE =#{bankSubmitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BANK_ACCOUNT_DATE =#{bankAccountDate,jdbcType=DATE},
FAIL_REASON =#{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE()
where BANK_ORDER_NO =#{bankOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
